statements: SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM advertising_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, conversion_rate, click_through_rate, campaign_id FROM advertising_campaigns
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE click_through_rate >= 3.5
SELECT campaign_name, click_through_rate FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate <= 2.0
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC, start_date ASC, conversion_rate DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5 AND conversion_rate > 0.3
SELECT campaign_name, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(click_through_rate) AS avg_ctr, AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conv FROM advertising_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, ROUND(conversion_rate * 100, 2) AS conversion_rate_percent FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate > 0.2 ORDER BY conversion_rate_percent DESC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM advertising_campaigns JOIN click_conversion_data ON advertising_campaigns.campaign_id = click_conversion_data.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_name FROM advertising_campaigns;

SELECT campaign_id, click_date FROM advertising_campaigns JOIN click_conversion_data ON advertising_campaigns.campaign_id = click_conversion_data.campaign_id WHERE conversion_status = TRUE ORDER BY click_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, click_date, conversion_status FROM advertising_campaigns JOIN click_conversion_data ON advertising_campaigns.campaign_id = click_conversion_data.campaign_id;

SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(click_id) AS total_clicks FROM advertising_campaigns JOIN click_conversion_data ON advertising_campaigns.campaign_id = click_conversion_data.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM click_data;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_cost FROM ad_data ORDER BY ad_cost DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM click_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT ad_id, ad_type, ad_cost FROM ad_data WHERE ad_type = 'video';
SELECT click_id, click_time, user_id FROM click_data WHERE click_amount > 5.00 ORDER BY click_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM click_data WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_cost FROM ad_data WHERE ad_cost > 50 ORDER BY ad_name ASC;
SELECT conversion_id, click_id, conversion_time FROM conversion_data WHERE conversion_amount > 100 ORDER BY conversion_time DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_type, ad_cost FROM ad_data WHERE ad_type = 'banner' OR ad_type = 'video' AND ad_cost < 200;
SELECT conversion_id, click_id, conversion_amount FROM conversion_data WHERE click_id IN (SELECT click_id FROM click_data WHERE user_id = 200);
SELECT * FROM click_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, click_time FROM click_data ORDER BY click_time DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE id = 3;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT id, conversion_time, campaign_id, conversion_value FROM conversion_data;
SELECT * FROM click_data WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT user_name, email FROM users ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000
SELECT user_name, email, age FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM campaign;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_cost FROM ad WHERE click_through_rate > 3.0;
SELECT ad_name, ad_cost, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM ad ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC, conversion_rate ASC;
SELECT ad_name, click_time, device_type FROM ad JOIN click_data ON ad.ad_id = click_data.ad_id WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaign;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_cost FROM ad WHERE ad_cost > 100;
SELECT ad_group_id, ad_group_name, campaign_id FROM ad_group ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT click_id, click_time, device_type FROM click_data WHERE device_type = 'mobile' ORDER BY click_time ASC;
SELECT conversion_id, conversion_time, conversion_value FROM conversion_data WHERE conversion_value > 500 ORDER BY conversion_time DESC;
